SIGNUP_HEADER: The phone number will be sent to your Email
SIGNUP_PASSWORD_POPOVERMSG: Please enter a passphrase or password with greater than 10 characters, numbers, lowercase, upppercase, and special characters.
SIGNUP_PASSWORD_ERR_0: The password must be at least 10 characters long.
SIGNUP_PASSWORD_ERR_1: The password must contain at least one lowercase letter.
SIGNUP_PASSWORD_ERR_2: The password must contain at least one uppercase letter.
SIGNUP_PASSWORD_ERR_3: The password must contain at least one special character.
SIGNUP_PASSWORD_ERR_4: The password may not contain sequences of three or more repeated characters.
SIGNUP_PASSWORD_ERR_5: The password must contain at least one number.
FORGOT_PASSWORD_EMAIL_NOT_FOUND: No account with that username has been found
FORGOT_PASSWORD_EMAIL_SEND_SUCCESS: An email has been sent to the provided email with further instructions.
RESET_PASSWORD_VERIFY_REQUIRED: Enter the password again to verify.
